short_description: exportdrvo is a wood building material store based in city of zagreb, croatia.
long_description: experts with 75 years of experience in international trade. one-stop-shop for hardwood from croatia. since its founding in 1948, exportdrvo is the center of the wood industry in the south east europe region.
business_tags: parquet | covered storage | shop for hardwood | engineered floor | solid floors | sawn timber | hardwood logs | wood products
generated_description: exportdrvo, legally known as exportdrvo d.d., based in grad bakar, primorje-gorski kotar county, croatia, is a prominent player in the wood industry in southeast europe. founded in 1948, the company specializes in the production and export of a wide range of wood products, including sawn timber, solid and engineered flooring, decking, cladding, and various types of panels. with over 30,000 square meters of covered storage space and 5,000 square meters of drying capacities, exportdrvo processes 250,000 cubic meters of hardwood logs annually. the company partners with more than 100 sawmills and exports to over 70 countries, serving more than 2,000 customers worldwide.
